name: genai-file-organizer
description: AI-powered local file organizer using Ollama or llama.cpp

scripts.install:all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.llama-server: echo 'Update this script with your model paths. Example:' && echo 'llama-server -m /path/to/your/model.gguf --mmproj /path/to/mmproj.gguf --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8080 -np 4 -cb -c 16384'

author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>
